precinct.translation[0].definitions[0].d: one of the areas that a town or city is divided into, so that elections or police work can be organized more easily
precinct.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the main police station in a particular area of a town or city
precinct.translation[1].definitions[0].d: an area of a city with many different shops, where cars are not allowed
precinct.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The hotel is within five minutes of the main shopping precinct.
precinct.translation[1].definitions[1].d: an area in a city with its own local government, police force etc
